text: Arau allahe upama dani dharaiche eta janapadara yito achila niraapada arau niscita, yaâ€™ta ke'uphalara paraa tara pracura jiranopakarana ahichila. Tathapi'o se'i janapadabasiye allahara anugraha asbikara karaile, phalata allahe sihamtaka ksudha arau atankara ararana japi di sihamtara krtakarmara soraada grahana karaale
